overview: 2 days until the “Last Graduation Ceremony” of high school, the building was to be demolished. Each student accepted their “farewell to youth” and moved forward with regret and hope in mind.  One student visits the library to meet her secret admirer who is also her teacher,  one calls her boyfriend with a strained relationship due to the distance of their colleges,  one is trying to expose a secret that she hid for the last 3 years,  and the last student, Manami, has to give a speech during the graduation ceremony but couldn’t overcome her pain.
title: Sayonara, Girls
